[The fleur de luce.] Collection Fleur de lys. Forget, Pierre, 1544-1610, attributed name. aut Arnauld, Antoine, 1560-1619, attributed name. aut
[28] p.
J. Wolfe, [London : 1593]
Title and imprint from STC. A translation of: La fleur de lys. Caption title on A2 recto has: The flower de luce. Which conteyneth the discourse of a Frenchman deteyned in Paris, vppon the impieties and counterfeatings conteyned in the manifest of Spayne, published in the month of Ianuary. 1593. Variously attributed to: Arnauld, Antoine and also to: Forget, Pierre. Signatures: A-C⁴ D² . Imperfect; lacks title page. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
